doc.title: The Campaigns of Napoleon: 1815 - Battle of Waterloo
doc.plot: This program tells the story of the final thunderous battle of the Napoleonic era featuring excerpts from major feature films, specially filmed authentic reconstruction and re-enactment footage, plus dramatized 'eye-witness' accounts of the battle. It provides a unique record of one of the turning points in world history. Narrated by Robert Powell. Featuring comment and analysis by Dr. David Chandler, former Head of War Studies at Sandhurst and author of 'The Campaigns of Napoleon'.
